english.segment1: Sometimes it's hard to see You, but I see Your people. Sometimes it's hard to hear You, but I heard Your preachers. My proof is in the way, the way that they shine. That's how I know that
english.segment2: The sun is coming down. I get the feeling that I'm not home yet. Yeah, it's Your people, They're Jesus to the world.
english.segment3: When it was hard to see You, they gave me another chance like You. When it was hard to hear You, I could hear them speak Your words. My proof is in the way, the way that they shine. That's how I know that
english.segment4: The sun is coming down. I get the feeling that I'm not home yet. Yeah, it's Your people, They're Jesus to the world.
english.segment5: And it's always the way, the way I know. And it's always the way, the way I know. And it's always the way I know. And it's always the way I know that
english.segment6: The sun is coming down. I get the feeling that I'm not home yet. The sun is coming down.
english.segment7: Yeah, it's Your people. They're Your people. They're Jesus to the world.
